comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: The Prudden SE-1 (reg. X-7414) was a conversion of the Prudden TM-1 Trimotor (reg. X-5728) into a single-engined aircraft powered by a Pratt & Whitney Wasp radial engine. Failing to draw any commercial interest, the aircraft was sold to the Mexican government, for use against rebels in that country. See: "Prudden's Metal Misfits" by Michael O'Leary, Aeroplane Monthly, April 2006, Page 49. en.calameo.com/read/000365390026067265c23
